typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ClienteCloudSales
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CabeceraVentaIn
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as string,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DetalleVentaIn
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DireccionCloudSales
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ClienteVan
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ClienteCof
Join1 derive(SistemaOrigen = "Southridge") ~> SistemaOrigen
CabeceraVentaIn derive(SistemaOrigen = "Southridge") ~> SistemaOrigen2
DetalleVentaIn derive(SistemaOrigen = "Southridge") ~> SistemaOrigen3
ClienteCloudSales, DireccionCloudSales join(ClienteCloudSales@CustomerID == DireccionCloudSales@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Select1, ClienteVanArsdel, ClienteCoffe union(byName: true)~> Union1
ClienteVan derive(SistemaOrigen = "VanArsdel") ~> ClienteVanArsdel
SistemaOrigen select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = ClienteCloudSales@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate = ClienteCloudSales@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = ClienteCloudSales@UpdatedDate,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		CreatedDate = DireccionCloudSales@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = DireccionCloudSales@UpdatedDate,
		SistemaOrigen
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
ClienteCof derive(SistemaOrigen = "Fourth Coffe") ~> ClienteCoffe
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Cliente
SistemaOrigen2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CabeceraVenta
SistemaOrigen3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DetalleVenta
